abilities.name: Indomitable Belief
abilities.rules: While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS CORE INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this WARLORD, the invulnerable save models in that unit receive from the Shield of Faith ability is improved by 1 (to a maximum of 4+).

abilities.name: Healing Tears
abilities.rules: Command End: At the end of your shooting phase and if Celestine is on the battlefield, revive up to 1 Geminae Superia and restore all lost wounds to all models in this unit.

abilities.name: Saintly Blessings
abilities.rules: Friendly IMPERIUM INFANTRY within 6" have a 6+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Angelic Saviour
abilities.rules: Can perform a Heroic Intervention if it is within 6" horizontally and 5" vertically of any enemy unit. Each time this unit makes a Heroic Intervention move, its models can move up to 6". All other rules for Heroic Interventions still apply.

abilities.name: Miraculous Intervention
abilities.rules: The first time CELESTINE is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase instead of using any rules that are triggered when a model is destroyed (e.g. Sacrifice). On a 1, this unit counts as having been destroyed for the purposes of Sacrifice; on a 2+, set CELESTINE back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where she was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with all her wounds remaining.

defensePreWoundChecks.name: Lifewards
defensePreWoundChecks.rules: Wounds against this unit are allocated to available Geminae Superia instead.

defensePreLeadershipChecks.name: Lifewards
defensePreLeadershipChecks.rules: Ignore Morale tests. Destroy remaining Geminae Superia models if Celestine is destroyed.
